mobs.LongDesc: A tall, serious looking guard stands here with a red design on his uniform.
A strong, tight lipped guard stands before you with a red insignia on his uniform.
A large black dog, bares his fangs at you and leaps for your throat!!
mobs.DetailedDesc: A large black dog.

mobs.LongDesc: A large black dog leaps at your throat!!
mobs.DetailedDesc: A large black dog.

mobs.LongDesc: A guard in a green uniform launches himself at you!!!
mobs.DetailedDesc: An tall muscular guard wearing a green uniform.

mobs.LongDesc: A small, imp like guy turns his evil eye towards you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a guy who has an impish appearance.  He is very evil, but yet
regrets what he has become.  He turns his evil eye towards you, pray
that your heart is strong.

mobs.LongDesc: A strange looking man.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A strange looking man with long fingernails and hair.  He has an evil
sense about him.  He evilly grins at you and you notice the long, white
fangs with saliva dripping off of them.  His eyes being to glow a 
crimson red as he prepares to dine, Can you guess who he is having
for dinner?

mobs.LongDesc: An unnoticed leader.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a dejected man before you.  He lost one of his best friends and
now has suddenly found himself in charge of the American Esp team.
Little does he know that he is hurtling towards his doom.

mobs.LongDesc: Igor is here looking at the future.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a middle-aged man.  He seems to be staring right through you.
He has a far away look, its seems that he is looking at a picture that
only he can see.  Suddenly he comes back to the present and smiles
at you.

mobs.LongDesc: A man with a blank stare.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a man lost in deep concentration.  You feel a slight presence
touch your mind and probe slightly into your memories.  You realize
that he is using his mind to probe yours.

mobs.LongDesc: Trevor is trying to read your mind, unsuccessfully as usual.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A young man, full of energy and ready for adventure.  His untried 
telepathic abilities make him strive even harder to prove to his
friends that he is a valuable part of the team.  He is the kind
of person that you just can't help, but like.

mobs.LongDesc: Ben is wondering if you told the truth, hmmmmm.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a middle-age man with an honest face.  He studies you intently.
This man is called the human lie-dectector because he knows when
your telling the truth to him.  He doesn't like to be lied to and
gets very angry when someone does.

mobs.LongDesc: Gregor Borowitz
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A strong looking man.  This man is a Russian in every sense of the word.
His belief in the Russian Esp team is unquestionable.  This man is
also a full for because the man he trusts will lead to his 
destruction.

mobs.LongDesc: Mikhail is here praying he never gets promoted!!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A strong Russian soldier dedicated to the cause.  His only passion is
to serve is commanding officer and he seeks nothing more.  A very
simple and loyal man.

mobs.LongDesc: Andrei is here plotting Gregor's downfall.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This Russian is very POWER hungry.  In time he would run the esp
branch for Russian, but he can't wait he wants it all.  So he
has plotted treachory only soon to be undone by a necromancer.

mobs.LongDesc: An average man with a unique ability.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man appears average in every sense of the word.  Its his unique
ability of deflection thats sets him above the rest.  Trying to 
attack him straight on and you will always miss, but doing it
unintentionally could seal his doom.

mobs.LongDesc: Felix is searching for others of his kinds.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A Russian citizen to the end.  He totally believes in doing his part for
his country.  He is quite good at realizing when people may be a problem,
especially other espers need to fear him for he knows when there about.

mobs.LongDesc: Guy is here trying to come up with the warning pictures.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A patroit to the end is his motto.  He seems to be trying to decipher
something only he can read.  His importance is highly rated for sometimes
he can give advanced warnings about the future that lets our boys
avoid mistakes.

mobs.LongDesc: Simon is here worrying about tomorrow.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a worried man.  He has very deep, wrinkles in his face from
fear.  He just knows something is going to go wrong, because nothing
can ever go right.

mobs.LongDesc: Ken is here searching the world for his next victim.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man has a far away look.  Suddenly a smile crosses his lips
and he quickly heads off towards the map room, for he has found
the location of his prey.

mobs.LongDesc: Carl is here reading your destiny.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man has a far away look when you enter.  He seems to be watching
a screen that only he can see.  He suddenly comes back to the present
with a horrible scream and flees from the room.

mobs.LongDesc: Darcy is here wondering which friend will die next due to his skill.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man smiles and seems very sure of himself.  For his skill always
finds some way to keep him out of trouble.  Some times he wishes he 
never had this skill because it puts his friends in danger to save
him.

mobs.LongDesc: Zek Foener is here delving into your mind.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A beatiful lady gazes at you and smiles fondly.  She is the pawn of 
evil men and wishes only to escape the terrible life she is forced
into.  Her freedom will come from none other than Harry Keogh.

mobs.LongDesc: The other is devouring a corpse.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Huge tentacles snaked towards you, seeking a hold.  A small body emerges
from the ground on the other end of the tentacles with a huge mouth 
dominating the creature's body.

mobs.LongDesc: Thibor is here plotting the death of his creator.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A huge warrior from times gone by.  His only goal in life is to overthrow
his creator and to take control of this tower.  He believes that it is
his right to rule this domain and he will crush the other wamphyri
under his rule to mindless slaves.

mobs.LongDesc: Yulian is here trying to escape thibor!!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A weird man who is fascinated by death.  He thinks he has achieved 
unreachable goals, but in reality he understands nothing.  His hate
for Thibor grows because he has been banished to this cellar to 
he figures out his powers.

mobs.LongDesc: Janos is here waiting to destroy you!!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Wamphyri in every sense stands before you.  His heart is filled with
the purest evil.  His only desire is to bring death and destruction to his
enemies.  He calls Thibor his brother by name only.  He seeks, as do all
Wamphyri, to increase his own powers while decreasing the powers of his
fellow Wamphyri.

mobs.LongDesc: Guardian Beast leaps to DESTROY you!!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A huge black creature, with crimson eyes and huge black wings.  His only
purpose is to kill all who dare enters his master's domain.

mobs.LongDesc: Fess is here plotting pillage and rape.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Another Evil-hearted Ferenczy stands before you.  He loves to destroy
things and enjoys plotting desctruction and death.  Nothing makes him
happy then to do battle with his own kind, unless its killing things
weaker then himself.

mobs.LongDesc: Faethor screams, "You DARE to invade my home, PREPARE TO MEET YOUR MAKER!!"
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This Wamphyri represents evil in all its glory.  His eyes grow bright
red as he meets your gaze.  His fangs are long and look very sharp indeed.
He cackles with total madness as he rises from his throne.  You realize
that your facing total evilness reincarnated.

mobs.LongDesc: Dramal is here designing his new tower.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
An evil, hideous Wamphyri stands before you.  He is the father to
Lady Karen and built this tower.  His one love is to bring utter
destruction to his enemies, so I wouldn't suggest getting in his
way.  His goal currently is to build a new tower for him to rule
from when he destroys the rest of his foes.

mobs.LongDesc: Lascula is here study a new transformation.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
His powers of metamorphis are beyond your understanding.  He has the
powers to grows claws just by thinking about it.  As he peers at
you deciding how to kill you, you notice his jaws seems to be stretching
till he has jaws like a shark easier to devour you.

mobs.LongDesc: Shaithis is here looking for battle.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Shaithis is the most fearsome of the Wamphyri, though by his appearance
you wouldn't realize this.  Though most Wamphyri respect no one, they
all respect the power of Shaithis.  Make sure your affairs are in order
and your friends know which next of kin to notify when you challenge
him, for to challenge him is to court death itself.

mobs.LongDesc: Wolf stands here guarding his master's property.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A huge, grey wolf eyes you hungrily.  He has sworn to protect his master
and will fight you to the death before letting you pass.  His
jaw seems capable of crushing even the hardest stone and you hope
that they won't end up around your throat.

mobs.LongDesc: Harry is here fighting his disease.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
An empossing human wearing a mask that covers his entire face.  Crimson
eyes meet your gaze and you see great sorrow and pain within those eyes.
He regrets taking his mother away from his father and feels pain for
what he has become due to his helping nature.  For the one thing he
detests is Wamphyri and that is the very thing he has become.

mobs.LongDesc: Mother Vampire is in a feeding frenzy.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A mother Vampire covered in bloods looks at you hungrily.  Her plans
was to inhabit Karen and use her to create new vampires, but thanks
to Harry Keogh she had to leave her host to seek blood, but she
seems to be very happy right where she is.

mobs.LongDesc: Fighter Beast attacks you on sight!!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a black hideous creature, with huge bat-like wings.  This
whole creature is designed for battle from his huge fangs, to his
long sharp claws.  This creature has excellent vision and only seeks
to destroy there master's foes.

mobs.LongDesc: Dweller slithers towards you looking for food!!!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A huge, ancient beast that looks very hungry.  Karen keeps him
very close in case she needs to fly off in a hurry to take care
of matters.  He is totally loyal to her and serves no one else.

mobs.LongDesc: Lady Karen gives you an icey stare.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Karen has cold, statue like beauty.  Her beauty is unearthly and you
believe that she is the most beautiful woman you have ever seen.
Her white dress hugs her body showing off her curves quite nicely.
You know you stand before a picture of a goddess and all you wish
to do is drop to your knees in worship.

mobs.LongDesc: Harry Keogh is opening Mobius doors here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A man who loves life.  He is beloved of the dead for he was the only
one who could bring light into there life.  Now he is a Wamphyri who
deeply loves Karen.  He is a gentle man, but challenge his love and
you will find out that he is truely a Wamphryi

mobs.LongDesc: Trog is here serving his master.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Trog is a loyal slave to his master.  You can see the hardships of
that slavery.

mobs.LongDesc: A guardian for the Ferenczy domain is waiting here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a black hideous creature, with huge bat-like wings.  This
whole creature is designed for battle from his huge fangs, to his
long sharp claws.  This creature has excellent vision and only seeks
to destroy there master's foes.

mobs.LongDesc: The Anvenging Spirit is here, attacking YOU!
mobs.DetailedDesc: The Avenging Spirit of Harry Keogh is attacking you and will make you pay!

mobs.LongDesc: A rampaging vampire looking for blood!!!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a black hideous creature, with huge bat-like wings.  This
whole creature is designed for battle from his huge fangs, to his
long sharp claws.  This creature has excellent vision and only seeks
to destroy there master's foes.

mobs.LongDesc: A rampaging vampire looking for blood!!!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a black hideous creature, with huge bat-like wings.  This
whole creature is designed for battle from his huge fangs, to his
long sharp claws.  This creature has excellent vision and only seeks
to destroy there master's foes.

mobs.LongDesc: A rampaging vampire looking for blood!!!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a black hideous creature, with huge bat-like wings.  This
whole creature is designed for battle from his huge fangs, to his
long sharp claws.  This creature has excellent vision and only seeks
to destroy there master's foes.

mobs.LongDesc: The Dark One gives you the evil eye of death.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A hideous experiment went wrong.  Shaithis was looking for the ultimate
monster, and he found it.  Just one thing went wrong, not even his powers
can control the dark one of evil.

mobs.LongDesc: Papa Smurf is here practicing magic.
mobs.DetailedDesc: An Annoying smurf you want to kill him.

mobs.LongDesc: Smurfette is here looking pretty.
mobs.DetailedDesc: An annoying smurf that deserves to be stepped on.
